amendment.description: Amendment made a technical correction to the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 110-666 to make a technical correction to the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Skelton amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
